properties.entry: SELECT P1.PRODUCT_NAME , P1.COMPANY_PRICE , P1.IMG_NAME , P1.IMG_PATH , P1.BRAND_NAME FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.COMPANY_PRICE , P.BRAND_NAME , P.STATUS , PIMG.IMG_NAME , PIMG.IMG_PATH , PIMG.IMG_STATUS , S.STOCK , S.TRADE_COUNT FROM PRODUCT P, PRODUCT_IMG PIMG, STOCK S WHERE P.PRODUCT_NAME = PIMG.PRODUCT_NAME AND PIMG.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME AND S.STOCK != 0 AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND PIMG.IMG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%','1.png') ORDER BY S.TRADE_COUNT DESC) P1 WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
